revision.text:
[[Image:Okres lucenec.png|thumb|right|300px|Location of Lučenec District in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]]]] '''Točnica''' is a [[village]] and [[municipality]] in the [[Lučenec District]] in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]] of [[Slovakia]]. [[Image:Slovakiakrajenumbers.png|left|thumb|300px|6: Banská Bystrica Region in Slovakia]] [[Image:Drevená zvonica - Točnica.jpg|thumb|center|250px|Wooden belfry (monument)]]


{{commons category|Točnica}} ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html {{Lucenec District}} {{BanskáBystrica-geo-stub}} {{coord|48|25|N|19|39|E|region:SK_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Villages and municipalities in Lučenec District|Tocnica]]
